Cambridge City

City Manager's Agenda Item
CMA 2025 #32
PLACED ON FILE
Mar 3, 2025 5:30 PM

A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to changes in the Clerk Department ordinance regarding a fee increase.

Information

Department:City Manager's OfficeSponsors:
Category:Transmitting Communication

Links

ReferenceORD 2025 # 4 : An Ordinance has been received from the City Clerk, relative to Chapter 2.24 - City Clerk Department, Section 2.24.050 entitled "Fee Schedule". PASSED TO A SECOND READING IN COUNCIL MARCH 3, 2025. CAN BE ORDAINED ON OR AFTER MARCH 24, 2025.
Originating Order

Attachments

Version History
  1. Printout
  2. 2025-02-25 Amendment 2.24.050 Clerks Fees fl FINAL to CMO

Body

 

 

To the Honorable, the City Council:

 

The Cambridge City Clerk Department (Clerk Department) provides numerous services to the public, including but not limited to the maintenance and issuance of vital records, issuance of marriage, domestic partnership, and professional certificates, and notary services. The Clerk Department has not updated its fees for the provision of these services, and others, since 2012. The Clerk Department, along with the Budget Office, have determined that the current fees do not generate enough compensation to offset the cost of providing the afore-mentioned services. Furthermore, the neighboring City of Somerville, as of July 1, 2024, increased its fees in order to better compensate it for the costs of providing similar services. Below is a table showing fees currently charged by the Clerk Department, pursuant to Cambridge Municipal Code, Section 2.24.050, and new proposed fees:

 

Service

Current Fees

Proposed Fees

Marriage Intention

$35.00

$50.00

Marriage Certificate

$10.00

$15.00

Birth Amendment/Corrections

$50.00

$50.00

Birth Certificates

$10.00

$15.00

Delayed Birth Record

$50.00

$50.00

Correct Death Errors

$50.00

$50.00

Death Certificate

$10.00

$15.00

Correct Marriage Certificate

$50.00

$50.00

Examine Vital Records:

 

 

(per hour or portion thereof)

$15.00

$15.00

(per additional one-half-hour or portion thereof)

$7.00

$7.00

Filing Trust

$35.00

$35.00

Domestic Partnership Applications

$35.00

$50.00

Domestic Partnership Certificate

$10.00

$10.00

Notarizing Non-Municipal Documents

$1.00

$5.00

Constables

$100.00

$100.00

Business Certificates (including
certified copy)

$50.00

$50.00

Amending Business Certificate

$10.00

$5.00

$5.00

Register Podiatrist

$50.00

$60.00

Register Electrolysis

$50.00

$60.00

Optometry Certificate

$50.00

$60.00

$50.00

$60.00

Power of Attorney

$35.00

$35.00

Closing-out Inventory

$10.00

$10.00

Petition for Zoning Amendment

$150.00

$150.00

Certified Copies Requested by
Senior Citizen

$5.00

$5.00

 

Updating the fees, as described above, will allow the Clerk Department to offset the costs of providing the services and bring Cambridge in-line with what a neighboring community is charging. Importantly, as the above table demonstrates these goals will be accomplished while only moderately increasing the current charged fees. Pursuant to G. L. c. 40, § 22F, the City Council must approve of any increase to the Clerk Department fees by majority vote.  I have attached a proposed ordinance amendment hereto and am requesting that the City Council pass the proposed ordinance amendment to a second reading.

 

 

Yi-An Huang

City Manager

 

Meeting History

Mar 3, 2025 5:30 PM  City Council Regular Meeting

ABSENT:E. Denise Simmons
